description: This file contains test cases for the 'Agent' class and its interactions with various tools and models, specifically testing the Nebius model, tool integrations, and asynchronous behavior within the 'nebius' context.

methods.name: test_tool_use
methods.description: Tests basic tool usage with the Nebius model and YFinanceTools.

methods.name: test_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming response with tool calls and content verification.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use
methods.description: Asynchronous test for tool usage with the Nebius model.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Asynchronous streaming test for tool calls and content verification.

methods.name: test_parallel_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple tool calls within a single response for multiple tickers.

methods.name: test_multiple_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple tools (YFinanceTools and DuckDuckGoTools) in a single agent run.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_no_parameters
methods.description: Tests a custom tool function without parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_optional_parameters
methods.description: Tests a custom tool function with optional parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_list_parameters
methods.description: Tests a tool that processes a list of URLs.
